title: (1) JBL VT4889 Permanent Install Line Array Loudspeaker
item_description:
(1) JBL VT4889 Permanent Install Line Array Loudspeaker

(1) JBL VT4889 Permanent Install Line Array Loudspeaker

  • Use: Designed for permanent installation
  • Bumpers for flying are not included
    • Bumpers - see lots 128-130
  • See lots 100-114 for matching speakers
  • All units are shrink-wrapped and stored properly before auction
  • Photo Gallery Note: photos are representative of this item.
  • Fullsize 3-Way High Directivity Line Array Element,
  • The VT4889 Three-Way Line Array Element is designed to deliver high-quality reinforcement of music and speech in a variety of applications including concert audio and corporate A/V presentations of all types for both portable users and fixed venue.
  • Advanced technology components: Differential Drive®, neodymium magnet, dual voice coil, Direct CooledTM cone transducers for low weight and high output
  • Industry’s smallest, lightest, most powerful 1.5˝ exit, 3˝ diaphragm high-frequency compression driver
  • Proprietary waveguides couple to create precision HF vertical slot aperture
  • Radiation Boundary Integrator® (R.B.I.): Patented technology integrates output of individual bandpass elements
  • Rugged DuraFlex™ exterior finish; weatherized components
  • Integrated S.A.F.E.™ suspension system: premium heat-treated alloys provide rigid, reliable hanging arrays
